body:
#Hello

Thanks for checking out my personal site! My name is Alex Lu and I graduated from UCLA with a BA in Design Media Arts in 2014. Over the last few years, I've been fortunate enough to have been able to develop my skillset at a very diverse set of places. While in school, I interned at Pixar Animation Studios, NASA Jet Propulsion Lab, and Mirada Studios. Upon graduation I worked at Microsoft as a Program Manager. Most recently, I've been working on a startup with two other cofounders. I've included writeups for some of the work I've done in the past. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out!

#Contact

Email: alex.lu [at] ucla.edu
